channel.name: Ayuda
channel.changes: v.2: - Fixed: No more infinite bucle when clicking on "update tv show episodes and local library". - Fixed: The "advancedsettings.xml" file optimization method now makes a backup before modifying it and, instead of replacing the file, it modifies the file and substitutes the optimised settings for streaming, everything in the existing "advancedsettings.xml" file. v.1:- First pelisalacarta 4 release
